EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Russell, You W-2 is now uploaded to your E file in the MBO account. To log in go to www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com> and click on log in. If you forgot your password our system will allow you to reset. Once you are in click on “Personal Info” (top menu bar) then “E File” left menu bar. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. Appreciated.I may need it before Friday. RussellOn Tue, Mar 5, 2013 at 5:40 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Russell, Great to hear from you! Your W-2 was mailed to your address on file which is 715 Barnes St. I will ask our payroll department to upload an electronic copy into your account. I will let you know when it is there and make sure you are able to log in to retrieve it. I will let you know as soon as I have it. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcF1cvElW%2BemKMazhkz7Mf5Gmuq9uBvTv09s7ygZ9feGlUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcF1cvElW%2BemKMazhkz7Mf5Gmuq9uBvTv09s7ygZ9feGlUg%3D%3D> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcF1cvElW%2BemKMazhkz7Mf5Gmuq9uBvTv09s7ygZ9feGlUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners! From: russell.klein.101@gmail.com <mailto:russell.klein.101@gmail.com> [mailto:russell.klein.101@gmail.com <mailto:russell.klein.101@gmail.com>] On Behalf Of Russell Klein Sent: Tuesday, March 05, 2013 11:12 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners Wants to Reach Out to You Thanks for reaching out, Sara. First thing, top of my head: how do I get a copy of my W2 for this coming tax season?Haven't logged into The System in a while... I'm not even sure if I know the website and/or my username/pwd. RussellOn Tue, Mar 5, 2013 at 10:54 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcF1cvElW%2BemKMazhkz7Mf5Gmuq9uBvTv09s7ygZ9feGlUg%3D%3D>> wrote:Hi Russell,I just wanted to take a moment to reach out to you and see where your current career path has taken you. As an MBO Alumni we want to make sure we stay in touch and let you know we are here to facilitate you with any of your consulting needs. If you have any further questions please feel free to reach out to me. Have a great week! Sara___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&tel:703.793.6028?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcF1cvElW%2BemKMazhkz7Mf5Gmuq9uBvTv09s7ygZ9feGlUg%3D%3D>f: 703.793.6068 <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&tel:703.793.6068?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcF1cvElW%2BemKMazhkz7Mf5Gmuq9uBvTv09s7ygZ9feGlUg%3D%3D>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcF1cvElW%2BemKMazhkz7Mf5Gmuq9uBvTv09s7ygZ9feGlUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcF1cvElW%2BemKMazhkz7Mf5Gmuq9uBvTv09s7ygZ9feGlUg%3D%3D> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcF1cvElW%2BemKMazhkz7Mf5Gmuq9uBvTv09s7ygZ9feGlUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners!
